Senior Software Test Engineer

Summary

We are looking for a Sr. Software Test Engineer with at least 5 years\u2019 experience in software testing to join our team, which is responsible for cutting-edge technology supporting Aristocrat's gaming platforms and Game Development Kits, which are used in casinos and venues around the world.
The Sr. Software Test Engineer will work closely with a team of Development and Test Engineers to plan, perform, and guide quality assurance activities that ensure the delivery of a high-quality gaming experience. This involves testing and reporting defects, reviewing defects reported internally and externally, assisting with a post-testing review for all releases, and maintaining the accuracy of all test documentation. Furthermore, the Sr. Software Test Engineer will mentor new and junior Software Test Engineers and foster a strong relationship with key stakeholders and business partners.

What You'll Do

  • As a Senior Software Test Engineer, you will be responsible for owning quality assurance on our gaming platform.
  • You will provide technical assessments on features and identify scope of work and dependencies to meet test requirements.
  • You will design, implement, and maintain test plans, test cases, and test configurations, as well as provide hands-on hardware configuration and test execution.
  • You will provide technical guidance in identifying automation targets and developing white box test scenarios.
  • You will participate in design reviews and recommend improvements.
  • You will work with cross functional stakeholders to ensure we deliver a high-quality gaming experience.
  • You will promote established processes and seek opportunities to streamline and improve both our technologies and our processes.
  • All other duties as assigned.

What We're Looking For

  • Excellent software testing skills with a strong understanding of software testing methodology.
  • 5+ years of experience testing embedded software, SDK or commercial software product releases.
  • Experience working with defect tracking and test management tools such as JIRA/Zephyr.
  • Prior experience in the gaming industry is desirable.
  • Strong knowledge of any scripting language (e.g., python) is desirable.
  • Good verbal and written communication skills to effectively interact with global stakeholders.
  • Software debugging and troubleshooting skills using industry standard tools.
  • Ability to analyze information and use logic to perform task efficiently, within deadlines.
  • Possesses good problem-solving skills to address work-related issues and problems.
  • Experience with Agile Scrum methodologies is desirable.
  • B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent is highly desirable.

Why Aristocrat?

  • World Leader in Gaming Entertainment
  • Robust benefits package
  • Global career opportunities

Our Values

  • All about the Player
  • Talent Unleashed
  • Collective Brilliance
  • Good Business Good Citizen
